summary: Soybeans (Glycine max) are legumes originally from East Asia. They're used in many ways, like making soy milk, tofu, and soy sauce. Soybeans are also fed to animals to produce meat and dairy. They're rich in protein, minerals, and vitamins. The oil from soybeans is used in food and industry. Plus, they're a cheap source of protein for packaged foods.
title: Soybean
